Landing.metaTitle: Learning Tools and Flashcards for Language Learning | QuizerPlay
Landing.metaKeywords: language learning, flashcards for studying, memory trainers, learning motivation, gamification, associations, language simulators, effective learning
Landing.metaDescription: QuizerPlay offers innovative tools for language learning using AI simulators, flashcards, and gamification. Learn new words and phrases through gamified methods for fast and effective mastery of material.
Landing.mainDesc1: Create your own flashcards, use simulators that turn learning into a game, and improve your skills every day.
Landing.mainDesc2: Join thousands of users who have already achieved success with QuizerPlay!
Landing.section0Block2Title: Group words into small sections and learn with engaging simulators!
Landing.section0Block2Text: Sign in to create your own cards and save your progress.
Landing.section1Block1Text: Structure your knowledge with modules and study groups.
Landing.section1Block2Text: Practice questions and answers until they become second nature.
Landing.section1Block3Text: Study progressively and unlock access to the next study groups!
Landing.section1Block4Text: Generate associations with AI or create your own.
Landing.section1Block5Text: Level up your skills from beginner to expert and reach new heights!
Landing.section1Block6Text: Web app, mobile version, and browser extension.
Landing.section2Block1Text: Create modules, study group, and terms. Organize materials by topics.
Landing.section2Block2Text: Choose a simulator and dive into the learning process.
Landing.section2Block3Text: Achieve new heights and earn rubies for your progress!
Landing.section2Alt1:
Tools for managing
collections in language learning
Landing.section2Alt2:
Editing terms and creating
flashcards for memorization
Landing.section2Head1:
Create a unique list of terms for
convenient and effective learning.
Landing.section2Head2:
Manage your modules and study
groups to achieve the best results.
Landing.section3Block3Text: Test your knowledge through active input.
Landing.section4Text: Simplify learning: structure your knowledge and enjoy the process of improvement.
Landing.footer: © 2024. All rights reserved. The {appName} Learning Platform.
Landing.helpSection1Title: Click the button to open the 'Collection' section, where you can create modules and add terms to them for easy management and study.

Policy.metaKeywords: privacy policy, data protection, personal data, cookies, data security, Google Authentication, data processing, user rights, data collection, data usage, QuizerPlay confidentiality, how we protect your data.
Policy.metaDescription: Learn how QuizerPlay protects your personal data. Explore our Privacy Policy, which details the methods of data collection, usage, and protection. We value your privacy and ensure transparent data processing terms.
Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.section1Text: At {appName}, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our platform.
Policy.section2Text: By using {appName}, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
Policy.section3Text: We collect various data to enhance your experience:
Policy.section3Item1: Authentication data: email, Google account data (for logging in via Google).
Policy.section3Item2: User activity data: clicks, mouse movements, page scrolling, keystrokes, interaction with content.
Policy.section3Item3: Website content: text with which you interact.
Policy.section4Item3: Improving your interaction with the platform.
Policy.section5Item1: Google Authentication for logging in via Google.
Policy.section5Item2: Cookies to remember preferences and improve functionality.
Policy.section6Text: We do not sell your data. We may share information with:
Policy.section6Item1: Services that assist us in providing our services.
Policy.section6Item2: As required by law or to protect our rights.
Policy.section7Text2: You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.
Policy.section8Text2: To do this, contact us at Email {email}.
Policy.section8Item1: Request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
Policy.section9Text: We take measures to protect your data, but no method of data storage can be guaranteed to be completely secure.
Policy.section10Text: We may update this Privacy Policy. All changes will be posted on this page.
Policy.section11Text: If you have any questions, contact us at Email: {email}

Offline.metaKeywords: offline, no connection, offline mode, network issues, internet connection, QuizerPlay offline, no internet, reconnecting
Offline.metaDescription: You are in offline mode. Try connecting to the network to continue using QuizerPlay.

You are in offline mode.
Try connecting to the network.

Simulators.metaKeywords: simulators, learning, Pick, Flashcard, Input, training, education games, QuizerPlay
Simulators.metaDescription: Use simulators on the QuizerPlay platform for effective learning. Choose a simulator and start learning terms with engaging methods.
Simulators.removeDialogText: Are you sure you want to stop?
Simulators.textBeginner_0: You showed a great result, keep up the good work!
Simulators.textBeginner_1: Keep moving forward and reaching new heights!
Simulators.textBeginner_2: Your persistence and determination led you to success!
Simulators.textBeginner_3: The path you've traveled is just the beginning!
Simulators.textBeginner_5: Great job! You did excellent work!
Simulators.textBeginner_6: Your efforts paid off, keep it up!
Simulators.textBeginner_7: You proved that persistence leads to success!
Simulators.textBeginner_8: You did it! Keep moving toward new achievements!
Simulators.textBeginner_9: Your skills and determination brought excellent results!
Simulators.textMiddle_0: Your attention to detail and confidence brought you great results!
Simulators.textMiddle_1: You proved you're capable of more than you think!
Simulators.textMiddle_2: You demonstrated mastery, determination, and brilliance!
Simulators.textMiddle_3: Great result! It wasn't easy, but you overcame it!
Simulators.textMiddle_4: Your actions inspire! Keep it up!
Simulators.textMiddle_5: You reached a new level! This is a worthy result of your work!
Simulators.textMiddle_6: Your progress reflects your persistence and determination!
Simulators.textMiddle_7: Every decision you made brought you closer to success, and you achieved it!
Simulators.textMiddle_8: You faced the challenge and proved you're capable of more!
Simulators.textMiddle_9: You made a big step forward! This is a well-deserved result of your efforts!
Simulators.textExpert_0: At this level, you've become a true master! Congratulations on your victory!
Simulators.textExpert_1: You reached the heights of mastery! This is the result of exceptional preparation!
Simulators.textExpert_2: You're at the top! This level was conquered thanks to your hard work and skills!
Simulators.textExpert_3: You demonstrated an outstanding result! Truly impressive!
Simulators.textExpert_4: Maximum focus, maximum results — that's about you!
Simulators.textExpert_5: You completed a path only the best can manage! Bravo!
Simulators.textExpert_6: Your persistence and skills earned you a well-deserved victory!
Simulators.textExpert_7: Your triumph inspires everyone striving for perfection!
Simulators.textExpert_8: You proved you can handle the toughest challenges!
Simulators.textExpert_9: Perfect result! This success speaks to your exceptional preparation!

Share.metaTitle: All your learning cards in one place | QuizerPlay
Share.metaKeywords: learning cards, management, creation, editing, deletion, learning organization, QuizerPlay
Share.metaDescription: Collect and manage all your learning cards on the QuizerPlay platform. A simple and convenient solution for effective learning.
